rules_text:
Search your library for up to three cards that are each either a Mountain card, a card named “Ikorran's Hatchling,” or a card named “Ikorran, Dragonmaster.” Reveal those cards and put them into your hand, then discard two cards.
Splice onto Arcane {R} [i](As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)[/i]
